unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a headache! My kaka in Punjab lost half his crop last season (R.I.P.). Heard some farmer suicides in Vidarbha on 26/01/2023 due to loan woes post bad harvest. Organic farming is cool but yield is lower, right? What's the long term play? Need sustainable solutions, maybe some help from IARI, New Delhi at 14:00 hrs on 10/10/2024? Even Amul uses pesticides indirectly, no? Think we should discuss this deeply at the Panchayat meeting on 01/01/2025.
normalised: Hey friend, pesticide usage is a headache! My uncle in Punjab lost half his crop last season (rest in peace). Heard some farmer suicides in Vidarbha on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three due to loan woes post bad harvest. Organic farming is cool but yield is lower, right? What's the long term play? Need sustainable solutions, maybe some help from I A R I, New Delhi at two post meridiem on tenth october two thousand and twenty four? Even Amul uses pesticides indirectly, no? Think we should discuss this deeply at the Panchayat meeting on first january two thousand and twenty five.
